price: 19. Ama daalimiinih yan mari sinam Yallih gitaa kee cakkik waasaah usun tama giti makkoote gita yakkem kaak faxan, usun akeerâ dabqal koroositaanaah, ugut kee galtó tanim manummaysan.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَبۡغُونَهَا عِوَجٗا وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yaṣuddūna ʿan sabīli al-lahi wayabghūnahā ʿiwajan wahum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūna
